Helen Evans Ramsaran (amụrụ na Mee 11, 1943) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe.  Ọrụ ya na-enyocha ụwa mbụ nke ememe ógè ochie, ihe omimi fossil fossil, ike omimi, na ihe owuwu sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Africa. Ọrụ Ramsaran sitere na njem ọ gàrà Africa n'afọ 1981, ọ bụ ezie na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya adịghị ndụ, enwere mmetụta zoro ezo nke ọnụnọ mmadụ. Ọrụ ya na-adịbeghị ányá na-enyocha mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na usoro na ihe onwunwe na-akwado ndụ, ọkachasị usoro okike mmírí na ụdị osisi na anụmanụ

A mụrụ Helen Ramsaran na Bryan, Texas na 1943. O nwetara nzèrè bachelọ nke sayensị na nka nka (1965) na Masters of Fine Art na ihe ọkpụkpụ (1968) na Mahadum steeti Ohio, ébé ọ gụrụ ọla nchara n'okpuru David Black na ịgbado ọkụ na John Freeman

Site na 1968-69, Ramsaran kụziri na Mahadum Florida A&M ma mesịa na Mahadụ Bowie State na Maryland site na 1970 ruo 1973. Ọ gụrụ foto na New School for Social Research na New York (1973 Xi na 1974), na eserese anatomical na Art Students League na New York site na 1975-1976
Ramsaran lara ezumike nká dị ka osote prọfesọ nké nka na John Jay College nke City of University of New York na 2008.
Ramsaran kwagara New York City na 1973
N'oge na-adịghị ányá mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị (1978), o mepụtara usoro ihe osise ọla nchara a na-akpọ Visual Tales
Nke a bụ naanị usoro ya nke na-akọ akụkọ ndụ onwe ónyé na nkwupụta ya ma na-ewere ụdị akụkọ anya
Ihe oyiyi na ụdị dị ka calligraphic, si otú a na-eweta nsogbu ụfọdụ dị nro ma na-esiri ike
N'ịrụ ọrụ a na Johnson Atelier Technical Institute of Sculpture na Princeton, New Jersey, Ramsaran nwèrè ike imeziwanye usoro nke ịkpụpụta ihe ndị dị nro.
Usoro Ramsaran na-adịbeghị ányá, nke e ji ụrọ ọcha a tụrụ atụ gbuo, abụghị ihe mgbagwoju ányà dị ka ọrụ ndị mbụ mana ha ka na-ekwurịta otu mgbagwoju ike na nrụgide anụ ahụ
Ebumnuche nke iberibe ndị a bụ ịnọchite anya ọnwụ nke coral reef na usoro ndị ọzọ na-akwado ndụ n'ihi mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe.
